The video was originally posted on a Fac: बोल कि “लब आज़ाद हैं तेरे” Shabnam' on January 24, 2020, with a caption claiming that Irfan Pathan was at Shaheen Bagh. This post has received a significant number of views, shares, and likes.
On January 14: 2020, Irfan Pathan shared a similar video on his Twitter and Facebook accounts, which shows a crowd of youngsters. This suggests that the video is unrelated to the Shaheen Bagh protests.
Trinamool Congress leader Madan Mitra: who is visible in the video, has shared photographs with Irfan Pathan on the same day of the video's posting. These photographs indicate that the video was taken during Pathan's visit to Kamarhati, Kolkata, and not at Shaheen Bagh.
